_sText:
OK, here it is. My month-long project finnaly complete. It took around a month to build, edit. Extra, texture & finish.

Fairly large, medium map. 
Sand dunes surround you while you hold out in OutPost29.

This map features the following;

Lab/Contact room.
Cage for your admins to teleport Zombies, in this case Arachnid into.
Armoury to re-plenish your ammo - M249 Machine Gun. P90. & M3 Shotgun. All weapons have 500 adittional rounds.
Tower.
Defensive postions.
Props to barricade the gate.
Additional entrances.
Custom textures. (Thanks Griffen)
Lots of detail on base surrounding & inside.

OK. That about does it. 

Alternet download:

http://www.garrysmod.org/downloads/?a=view&id=111972



~Install~ Right'O. 

When you have downloaded the map from one of the excelent supplyers, open the ".zip" file.
Inside the "Cstrike" there should be "Materials" & "Maps".
Drag, to Cstrike/Cstrike or copy & past into the area. The only reasonI included the "Materials" is is because I don't have the tool for Custom Textures, sorry.

Hope you enjoy this map, there is a server that it will be using; 
69.197.190.188:27015

Thanks to all that helped make this map. 
Please leave feedback on improving this map!
Do correct me if I missed anyone in the Credits and please rate/Vote this map!

Happy Fragging.


EJHF.
